original_text: And he stationed the Levites in the house of the Lord with cymbals, harps, and lyres, according to the commandment of David and of Gad the king's seer and of Nathan the prophet, for the commandment was from the Lord through his prophets.
korean_text: 왕이 레위 사람들을 여호와의 전에 두어서 다윗과 왕의 선견자 갓과 선지자 나단이 명령한 대로 제금과 비파와 수금을 잡게 하니 이는 여호와께서 그의 선지자들로 이렇게 명령하셨음이라

sentences.original_text: And he stationed the Levites in the house of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 여호와의 집에 레위 사람들을 세우니

sentences.original_text: according to the commandment of David
and of Gad the king's seer
for the commandment was from the Lord
